author: sf
msg: Change default for SSLCompression to off, as compression
causes security issues in most setups

author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Pierre Smits for "Receive inventory generates an error when product has mandatory lotid" https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-5275
When a product has lotid set to mandatory the receipt of inventory in facility generates following error:
The lotId is mandatory for the product M-AMBER-40.
However, it is not possible to set the lotid on the receipt form.

author: trawick
